backend/main.mo: Defines game rule types and preset rule data for multiple card games, plus initial structures for game sessions and scoring.
feature_evidence.json: Maps features to affected files, components, and test IDs for traceability with high-confidence evidence entries.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend source files including hooks, screens, scoring logic, and components.
frontend/deployment-logs/.gitignore: Ignores all generated deployment log files while keeping the directory.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Provides instructions and prerequisites for running local builds and deployments with DFX and Node.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom light and dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the frontend app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/scripts/rebuild-and-capture-log: Node script that runs full backend and frontend rebuild/deploy steps while capturing logs to timestamped files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, root layout, and routing for all major app screens with profile setup handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time user profile creation that saves the profile via the backend actor and refreshes cached data.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component with navigation, responsive mobile menu, and auto-hiding header using router state and auth status.
frontend/src/components/rules/GameRulesD: Dialog showing a game's rules and win conditions based on a provided template.
frontend/src/components/scores/EditRound: Dialog for editing round scores, selecting the appropriate score entry component and handling confirmation before saving.
frontend/src/components/scores/Flip7Scor: Score entry UI for Flip7, tracking selected cards, modifiers, multipliers, manual scores, and computing final scores.
frontend/src/components/scores/GenericGa: Basic score entry form for generic games, validating numeric input and submitting player scores.
frontend/src/components/scores/MilleBorn: Score entry form for Mille Bornes, handling distance, bonuses, trip conditions, and computing total scores.
frontend/src/components/scores/NertsScor: Form component for entering Nerts round scores, handling center and tableau card inputs, validation, and computed scoring before submitting.
frontend/src/components/scores/RoundsTab: Displays a table of rounds with per‑player scores and provides an edit button for each round.
frontend/src/components/scores/SkyjoScor: Simple score entry form for Skyjo that tracks per‑player numeric inputs and submits validated scores.
frontend/src/gameTemplates.ts: Defines game templates and a factory to create typed GameType objects with rules, scoring, and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoHideHeaderOnSc: Hook that tracks scroll direction to hide or show the header after passing a threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile using the active actor and Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameSessions.ts: Provides hooks to fetch sessions, fetch a specific session, and mutate rounds or create sessions via backend actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerProfiles.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, create, and fetch individual player profiles via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies global styles.
frontend/src/lib/scoring.ts: Implements score aggregation, standings calculation, and game-end logic for multiple game types.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Declares TypeScript types for players, rounds, entry states, and sessions across all supported games.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/screens/GamePickerScreen.ts: Displays available games and navigates to the setup screen when a game is selected.
frontend/src/screens/HistoryScreen.tsx: Shows saved game sessions with navigation, handling authentication and loading states.
frontend/src/screens/ProfilesScreen.tsx: Manages player profiles with creation, listing, and authentication handling UI.
frontend/src/screens/ScoreSheetScreen.ts: Loads or initializes a session, displays standings, handles round entry/editing, and checks game completion.
Screen for configuring a new game session, allowing profile-based or quick players and validating player counts before creating a session.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallbacks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, and pending Phase 10 scorecard functionality.
